about_the_game:
【About the game】

◆ Caution ◆
All in-game text has been translated using machine translation.



◆ About this trial version ◆
In this trial version, you can play a part of the common route of the product and a part of the sex scene of the main story from “SPECIAL” on the title screen after playing the trial version.
After playing the trial version, you can play a part of the sex scenes in the full version from the “SPECIAL” menu on the title screen.



◆ Story ◆
"Aki, how many times do I have to tell you?"

Akihiko Narumiya, who is constantly criticized for his sloppy lifestyle, sighs deeply in his heart. Just as he is about to tell his sister to stop, a certain item he ordered online arrives at his house.

"What? Were you scolded by Sis Ritsuko again? Geez, Aki is really hopeless, isn't he?"

This boisterous character is Narumiya's other sister, Makoto. This careless-natured sister has always been blunt and mercilessly digs into her own emotional wounds.

The item he has obtained is a hypnosis device. Will he be able to freely manipulate the noisy two sisters using the hypnosis device?



【Character Introduction】


Name: Ritsuko Narumiya
Height: 164 cm
Measurements: 118/62/90
Characteristics: High pride, elite, serious
Attributes: Hidden masochist, weak point is anal, has a desire to transform

Ritsuko is Akihiko's older sister and a 6-year veteran employee at a major company, often referred to as an elite employee. Recently, she has been entrusted with a large project, which has created a tense atmosphere around her. From before, she has been overly critical and nagging towards the sloppy Akihiko (in fact, she treats both Akihiko and Makoto the same way). This has been extremely painful for Akihiko, and he has come to avoid seeing her as much as possible. During her student days, she was focused solely on her studies, and even after graduating, she has had little romantic experience. She ends up deeply immersed in the hypnotic sex that Akihiko has set up for her.






Name: Narumiya Makoto
Height: 168 cm
Measurements: 121/58/85
Characteristics: Athletic, caring, proactive
Attributes: Masturbation lover, scent fetish, exhibitionist tendencies

She is the younger sister of Ritsuko and the other older sister of Akihiko. She is more athletically inclined and attends a prestigious university known for its sports programs. Her bright and straightforward personality, which often comes across as meddlesome, is seen as annoying and troublesome by Akihiko. However, she does not clearly dislike Akihiko, and her impression is more like "if only he could be a bit more put together." Similar to Akihiko, she is also often scolded by Ritsuko, but unlike him, the more adaptable Makoto is able to skillfully avoid those situations. She has a boyfriend named Kenji who is in the same year as her.




※Japanese voice recording (※male characters are not recorded)


◆ Game Specifications ◆

・Novel game that progresses with a click
・Heroine fully voiced
・CG mode
・Scene recollection


◆ Content Warning ◆
This game includes content that may not be suitable for all ages and may not be appropriate for display in the workplace.
The game contains nudity or sexual content, as well as general adult-oriented content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace. This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace. Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

This game contains the following content

Sex without consent
Extreme play
Incest
Intercourse with pregnant women
SM play
Sex through mind control or brainwashing by hypnotic devices


These actions can be a crime.
Never imitate them.

All characters are over 20 years old.

name: 姉姉Z催眠 - MOTION EDITION - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.

Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt
Derbe Sprache

short_description: Use the hypnosis device on your cell phone to control your sisters at will! Expose them at home or at work!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
